subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Unlike this season's undefeated stretch for the Colts, the first 13 weeks of last season were full of leisurely victories, a defense built to preserve leads married with the league’s most explosive offense.
snippet: Unlike this season's undefeated stretch for the Colts, the first 13 weeks of last season were full of leisurely victories, a defense built to preserve leads married with the league’s most explosive offense.
